Key Match Events: Magic center Wendell Carter Jr. scored a season-high 19 points against the Knicks at Madison Square Garden.
Pre-Game Insights: Prior to the game, Jalen Suggs sent a text message to his coach emphasizing the need to change their mentality as they were 0-3 against the Knicks.
Orlando was aware that they had failed in all their matchups against the Knicks in the past 34 days.
